title: MFA Required - push notification - login
custom_preconds: GIVEN an account is setup to require OKTA MFA
custom_steps:
WHEN user logs in
AND chooses to send okta push notification
custom_expected:
THEN user should receive push on linked device and be able to accept
AND once accepted user should be logged in

title: MFA Require - enter pass code - login
custom_preconds: GIVEN an account is setup to require OKTA MFA
custom_steps:
WHEN user logs in
AND chooses "I have a code" option for MFA
AND enters pass code from okta on the linked device
custom_expected: THEN once code is entered user should be logged in

title: MFA not required - login
custom_preconds: GIVEN an account is setup to NOT require OKTA MFA
custom_expected:
THEN user should NOT be prompted for MFA from okta
AND user should be logged in

title: MFA required - run reports to test BO login
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an account is setup to require OKTA MFA
AND user has successfully authenticated via okta (push or code)
AND user is logged in to EBIS
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to run a report
custom_expected:
THEN BO session login should work correctly
AND user should be able to run report with no issues

title: MFA not required - run reports to test BO login
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an account is setup to NOT require OKTA MFA
AND user is logged in to EBIS
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to run a report
custom_expected:
THEN BO session login should work correctly
AND user should be able to run report with no issues

title: MFA Required - login to WLP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an account is setup to require OKTA MFA (On the EBIS Side)
AND the account has perms for WLP
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to login to WLP with valid credentials
custom_expected:
THEN user should NOT be prompted for MFA
AND user should be logged in

title: MFA not required - login to WLP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an account is setup to NOT require OKTA MFA (On the EBIS Side)
AND the account has perms for WLP
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to login to WLP with valid credentials
custom_expected:
THEN user should NOT be prompted for MFA
AND user should be logged in

title: Login redirect
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing the eBIS login page
custom_expected: THEN the user is NOT redirected back to the login screen

title: Invalid Username - Valid pw
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has entered an invalid username but a valid PW

title: Valid Username - Invalid pw
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has entered an valid username but an invalid pw

title: Invalid Username - Invalid pw
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has entered an invalid username and an invalid PW

title: Non-Existent User
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has entered a username that does not exist in the system

title: MFA required - Push timed out
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an account is setup to require OKTA MFA
AND user has logged in
AND user has chosen the OKTA push notification option and clicked send push
custom_steps: WHEN user allows the push notif to timeout (30 seconds)
custom_expected: THEN push should expire and user should be prompted to re-authenticate

title: MFA required - Invalid pass code
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an account is setup to require OKTA MFA
AND user has logged in
AND user has chosen the OKTA "i have a code" option
custom_steps: WHEN user enters an invalid passcode
custom_expected: THEN error message should fire and user should be unable to login

title: MFA Required - Logout manually with another authenticated tab open
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an account is setup to require OKTA MFA
AND user has successfully authenticated via okta (push or code)
AND user is logged in to EBIS
AND user has 2 or more authenticated EBIS tabs open
custom_steps: WHEN user logs out of EBIS manually
custom_expected:
THEN user should be logged out
AND if user attempts to refresh other tabs or navigate to previously authenticated urls they should be prompted to login again

title: MFA Required - Logout from inactivity with another authenticated tab open
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an account is setup to require OKTA MFA
AND user has successfully authenticated via okta (push or code)
AND user is logged in to EBIS
AND user has 2 or more authenticated EBIS tabs open
custom_steps: WHEN user is logged out of EBIS by sitting idly for too long
custom_expected:
THEN user should be logged out
AND if user attempts to refresh other tabs or navigate to previously authenticated urls they should be prompted to login again

title: MFA NOT Required - Logout manually with another authenticated tab open
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an account is setup to NOT require OKTA MFA
AND user is logged in to EBIS
AND user has 2 or more EBIS tabs open
custom_steps: WHEN user logs out of EBIS manually
custom_expected:
THEN user should be logged out
AND if user attempts to refresh other tabs or navigate to previously authenticated urls they should be prompted to login again

title: MFA NOT Required - Logout from inactivity with another authenticated tab open
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an account is setup to NOT require OKTA MFA
AND user is logged in to EBIS
AND user has 2 or more EBIS tabs open
custom_steps: WHEN user is logged out of EBIS by sitting idly for too long
custom_expected:
THEN user should be logged out
AND if user attempts to refresh other tabs or navigate to previously authenticated urls they should be prompted to login again

title: MFA Required - Device Not Enrolled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an account is setup to require OKTA MFA(Test-CHI-viewer@mlb.com)
BUT the account is not linked to a device
